data.text:
CONDITIONS OF ACCESS AND USE

Any person who accesses the FUNDACIÓN DCHwebsite is considered a User. The User agrees to use the Web page and those services made available through the same, in accordance with the Law, morality, good customs and public order, as well as with the provisions of these clauses. Consequently, you are obliged not to use the Web for illicit purposes or effects and/or contrary to what is established, harmful to the rights and/or interests of third parties or that, in any way, may damage the Web or impede its normal use, or the services accessible through it.

The use of the Web and/or its Services shall imply the full and unreserved acceptance and validity of each and every one of the clauses contained in the latest updated version of this Legal Notice, so the User must be aware of the importance of reading them every time he/she visits the Web.

INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY

The source code, graphic designs, images, photographs, videos, sounds, animations, software, texts, as well as the information and contents contained in the Web are protected by Spanish legislation on intellectual and industrial property rights in favor of DCH FOUNDATION from third party licensors. The reproduction and/or publication, in whole or in part, of the Web, or its computer processing, distribution, dissemination, modification, transformation or decompilation, or any other legally recognized rights of the owner, is not permitted without the prior written permission of the owner. The User, solely and exclusively, may use the material that appears on the Web for personal and private use, being prohibited its use for commercial purposes or to engage in illegal activities. All intellectual property rights are expressly reserved by the following companies DCH FOUNDATION third party licensors, which will ensure compliance with the above conditions and the proper use of the contents presented in its web pages, exercising all civil and criminal actions that apply in the case of infringement or violation of these rights by the User.

PRIVACY POLICY.

FUNDACIÓN DCH is committed to protecting the privacy of users accessing this website and/or any of its services. The use of the website and/or any of the services offered by FUNDACIÓN DCH, implies the acceptance by the user of the provisions contained in this Privacy Policy and that their personal data will be treated as stipulated. Please note that, although there may be links from our site to other sites, this Privacy Policy does not apply to other companies or organizations to which the site is redirected. FUNDACIÓN DCH does not control the content of third party websites nor accepts any responsibility for the content or privacy policies of these websites.

PRIVACY ISSUES

In compliance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 (GDPR) and Organic Law 3/2018 of 5 December on the Protection of Personal Data and Guarantee of Digital Rights, we provide you with the following information on the processing of personal data that you may provide to us:

Who is responsible for the processing of your data?

DCH FOUNDATION

Our contact details can be found at the top of this legal notice.

We process the information provided to us to provide and bill our services.

If you give us your consent we may also process your data to send you information about services or activities.

How long will we keep your data?

The personal data provided will be kept for as long as the members wish to be part of the foundation. That is, as long as you are a user of our foundation or want to continue receiving information about activities, acts, social events organized by the DCH Foundation.

What legitimacy do we have to process your data?

The legal basis for the processing of your data are the consents given to us by the members themselves.

To whom will we disclose your information?

The data will not be communicated to third parties, unless required by law or necessary to fulfill the purpose of the processing.

Any person has the right to obtain confirmation as to whether or not we are processing his or her personal data.

Interested parties have the right to access their personal data, as well as to request the rectification of inaccurate data or request its deletion when, among other reasons, the data is no longer necessary for the purposes for which it was collected.

In certain circumstances the persons concerned may request the limitation of the processing of their data, in this case we will only keep them for the exercise or defense of claims.

In certain circumstances and for reasons related to his/her particular situation, the data subject may object to the processing of his/her data. In this case we will stop processing them, except for compelling legitimate reasons or for the exercise or defense of possible claims.

The persons concerned also have the right to the portability of their data.

Finally, the interested parties have the right to file a complaint with the competent Control Authority.

How can you exercise your rights?

By sending us a letter attaching a copy of a document that identifies you to our address by letter addressed to our administration department located at C. José Echegaray, 8, Parque Empresarial Alvia. Building 3, office 4, 1st floor. 28232, Las Rozas de Madrid, Madrid, or by e-mail at coordinacion@orgdch.org.

How did we obtain your data?

The personal data we process come from the interested party or partner, who guarantees that the data provided are true and is responsible for communicating any changes to them. Data marked with an asterisk is mandatory in order to provide you with the requested service.

What data do we process?

The data we process ranges from the following categories:

Identification data.

Postal or electronic addresses.

Other information requested in our forms.

The data is limited, since we only process the data necessary for the provision of our services and the management of our activity.

WHAT SECURITY MEASURES DO WE APPLY?

We apply the security measures established in Article 32 of the RGPD, we adopt security measures that are appropriate to the risk of data processing available, using mechanisms that allow us to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, availability and ongoing resilience of systems and processing services.

Some of these measures are:

Information of the data processing policies to the personnel.

Performing periodic backups.

Data access control.

Regular verification, evaluation and assessment processes.

EXCLUSION OF LIABILITY

DCH FOUNDATION with the utmost diligence to ensure that the data and information provided on its website is updated at all times. It does not guarantee and is not responsible for the accuracy and updating of the contents of the website, reserving the right to modify these contents at any time. FUNDACIÓN DCH will be responsible for the information that can be obtained through links included in the website.

Relationships between clients or partners will be governed by the general conditions that, if necessary, would be established by FUNDACIÓN DCH in a specific document for this purpose, or for specific agreements that may be agreed with clients or partners.

INFORMATION AND COMMERCIAL ADVERTISING POLICY.

FUNDACIÓN DCH undertakes through this medium not to carry out misleading advertising. For these purposes, therefore, formal or numerical errors that may be found throughout the content of the different sections of the Web, produced as a result of incomplete maintenance and/or updating of the information contained in these sections, shall not be considered as misleading advertising. FUNDACIÓN DCH,as a consequence of the provisions of this paragraph, undertakes to correct it as soon as it becomes aware of such errors.

FUNDACIÓN DCH undertakes not to send commercial communications without identifying them as such, in accordance with the provisions of Law 34/2002 of Services of the Information Society and electronic commerce. For these purposes, any information sent to members that are part of the DCH FOUNDATION the purpose of maintaining the relationship that exists between the partner and DCH FOUNDATIONThe Foundation shall also carry out information tasks and other activities organized or carried out by the Foundation itself so that members may participate in them.

CONDITIONS OF USE. JURISDICTION AND APPLICABLE LAWS.
